Text: Mark Crispin Miller, a professor at New York University, explains how US elections are stolen:  http://www.informationclearinghouse.info/article45799.htm   He outlines what can be done, but those in power will not do it. Revolution is probably the only solution.  The post Mark Crispin Miller, a professor at New York University, explains how US elections are stolen: appeared first on PaulCraigRoberts.org .
